title: Walston
subtitle: Arrival and Negotiation
description: The Travellers arrive on Walston and discover their ship isn't simply waiting for them. They must negotiate with Minister Greener and navigate local society.
dramatic_purpose: Rising action - obstacles emerge, characters are tested

atmosphere.tone: Businesslike with undercurrents of local tension
atmosphere.music_suggestion: Frontier town, sparse, with hints of tension

narrator_notes: This is where the Travellers learn that nothing comes easy. Greener is fair but firm - the previous crew already received payment. The Vargr situation should be introduced subtly. Startown offers intel for those who seek it.
